snippet.title: A Webbing Journey - Official Kitchen Demo Trailer | IndieMania Showcase 2024
snippet.description: Dive into A Webbing Journey, a physics-based sandbox adventure game where you play as Silky, a lovable little spider. Check out the trailer as Silky explores a farmhouse-style kitchen. Build intricate webs, help with oversized chores, and interact with countless objects in an environment filled with secrets. From cooking and cleaning to pure web-based chaos, the possibilities are endless! A Webbing Journey will be available on PC, and the Kitchen demo is available now on Steam.
